TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MountAddedHandler(object o, MountAddedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MountAddedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MountAddedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MountAddedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MountAddedHandler is removed from the event.
